titles.title: Oh Let Me Love You Lord.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed Amazing Grace
Blessed amazing grace
Saved by His sacrifice
He purchased for me a place
And a name in the Book of Life
Pure and unchanging love
That rescued my wretched soul
He gave me new life from above
As He's touched and made me whole

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh, let me love you Lord
The way that you love me
All that I am, all that I can
All I will ever be
Now and forever
Now and for always
Let all that I do
Bring glory to you
Honor and praise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mercy that lifted me up
To a life lived within the veil
He bade me to drink from a cup
Drawn from a living well.
Robes that have been washed white
And a joy that's unspeakable
You've taken my widow's mite
And returned twelve baskets full.
